Subject: Performence Slow notification showing -- in Deny/Allow list
Description:
Dear TEam, we are continuously seeing below error message in Allow /deny list.
Using a large number of long lists can affect EPP Client performance. Keep lists concise for optimal performance.
What_We_Know__c:
Update 25/04/2024
Client is having difficulties with setting up an allowlist to make it work and is also concerned about the banner from the allowlist where he's getting a recommendation about ''Using a large number of long lists can affect EPP Client performance. Keep lists concise for optimal performance.''.


Update 25/04/2024

Connected remote with the client in regards of the case to take a look and explained what that recommendation is and how it works.
Client did not actually had any problems with the allowlists/denylists, they just wanted to see if it's problematic to see that message.
Next_Steps__c:
Update 25/04/2024

Sent note with the remote details and an explanation on what the banner means.

Update 25/04/2024

Closing ticket.
Solution_Comment__c: Informed the client about the message and what it represents.
